Module com.example._50zo
Package com.example._50zo.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.example._50zo.model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPlayer
public class Player extends Object implements IPlayer
Represents a player in the "Cincuentazo" game. The class also provides methods to check which cards can be legally played according to the current total on the table.
